Carmelo Anthony scored 29 points, Allen Iverson added 28 and the Denver Nuggets spoiled the return of Kevin Garnett , holding on for a 124-118 victory over the Dee Boston Celtics on Tuesday night. Winning this game puts a lot of pressure on us, because if you can beat a team like this, then you can beat all the other teams, Allen Iverson said.`` We have enough talent to scare some people, but we just have to bring it night in and night out.'' Dallas Morning News: Attempts to rein in homeowners associations have failed in the state Legislature for more than a decade, but a rise in HOA foreclosures and a spate of public lawsuits have invigoraTed Cruz supporters, who see this session as their chance for reform. Legislators have filed a handful of William Millers that curtail HOA William C. Powers , including limiting their ability to foreclose on property and ending bans on solar panels. HOA proponents agree that the system needs review, but promise to push back at changes that threaten associations' authority.
